mapper.sql: cfw.PID, fund_value, fund_type, business_type, account_balance, cfw.customer_id, cfw.status, happen_time, cfw.create_user, cfw.create_time, cfw.last_update_user, cfw.last_update_time, fun_wat_desc,fkey, cust.customer_name,cust.sname,cust.phone_no
cfw.PID PID, cfw.fund_value fund_value, cfw.fund_type fund_type, cfw.customer_id customer_id, cfw.status status, cfw.happen_time happen_time, cfw.fun_wat_desc fun_wat_desc
mapper.select: select cfw.PID, cfw.happen_time happen_time, cfw.account_balance account_balance, cfw.business_type fund_type, cfw.fund_value fund_value, cfw.fun_wat_desc fun_wat_desc from t_cust_fund_water cfw, t_cust_customer tcc WHERE cfw.customer_id = tcc.PID AND cfw.customer_id = #{custFundWater.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_cust_fund_water cfw left join t_cust_customer cust on cfw.customer_id = cust.pid where 1 = 1 and cfw.status >= 0
and cust.customer_name like concat('%',#{parasMap.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.sname like concat('%',#{parasMap.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.phone_No like concat('%',#{parasMap.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cfw.fund_type = #{parasMap.fundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cfw.business_type = #{parasMap.businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DATE_FORMAT(cfw.happen_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{parasMap.happenTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by cfw.create_time desc

select * from ( select *, (@rown := @rown + 1) rowns from (
select
from t_cust_fund_water cfw left join t_cust_customer cust on cfw.customer_id = cust.pid where 1 = 1 and cfw.status >= 0
and cust.customer_name like concat('%',#{parasMap.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.sname like concat('%',#{parasMap.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.phone_No like concat('%',#{parasMap.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cfw.fund_type = #{parasMap.fundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cfw.business_type = #{parasMap.businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DATE_FORMAT(cfw.happen_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{parasMap.happenTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by cfw.create_time desc )t, (SELECT @rown := 0) b ) t where 1=1

if.test: expm.exportSet == 2 and expm.startCheckpage != null and expm.endCheckpage != null
expm.exportSet == 3 and expm.startCheckrecords != null and expm.endCheckrecords != null

mapper.select:
SELECT cfw.business_type business_type, sum(cfw.account_balance) account_balance, sum(cfw.fund_value) fund_value FROM t_cust_fund_water cfw left join t_cust_customer cust on cfw.customer_id = cust.pid where 1=1 and cfw.status >= 0
and cust.customer_name like concat('%',#{parasMap.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.sname like concat('%',#{parasMap.sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cust.phone_No like concat('%',#{parasMap.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and cfw.fund_type = #{parasMap.fundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cfw.business_type = #{parasMap.businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DATE_FORMAT(cfw.happen_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{parasMap.happenTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by cfw.business_type order by cfw.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_cust_fund_water (PID, customer_id, fund_value, fund_type, business_type, account_balance, status, happen_time, create_user, create_time, last_update_user, last_update_time, fun_wat_desc,fkey) values (#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBalance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{happenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{funWatDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select cfw.PID, cfw.happen_time happen_time, cfw.account_balance account_balance, (SELECT ts.dict_cont_name FROM t_sys_dictionary tsd,t_sys_dictionary_content ts WHERE tsd.PID = ts.dict_id AND tsd.dict_code = 'CUST_TRADE_TYPE' AND ts.dict_cont_code = cfw.business_type) business_type, cfw.business_type business_type_value, cfw.fund_value fund_value, cfw.fun_wat_desc fun_wat_desc from t_cust_fund_water cfw, t_cust_customer tcc WHERE cfw.customer_id = tcc.PID AND cfw.customer_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY cfw.happen_time DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into t_cust_fund_water (PID, customer_id, fund_value, fund_type, business_type, account_balance, status, happen_time, create_time, fun_wat_desc,fkey) values
#{custFW.pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFW.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFW.fundValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custFW.fundType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFW.businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFW.accountBalance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{custFW.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custFW.happenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custFW.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{custFW.funWatDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custFW.fkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
